progress.label: Progress
progress.remaining: {{count}} days remaining. You can do it!
progress.remaining_plural: {{count}} days remaining. You can do it!

cooldown.title: Cooldown Active
cooldown.description: You have failed. 24 hours are needed to recover.
cooldown.detailed: You have failed. Time is needed to recover before continuing.

preChallenge.title: The Challenge is About to Begin!
preChallenge.description: Prepare yourself. The challenge begins in:

notifications.title: Daily Reminders
notifications.description: Choose a time to receive a daily check-in notification.
notifications.blocked: Notifications are blocked in your browser settings.

toast.success: Saved! Notifications will be sent at {{time}}.
toast.warning: You need to allow notifications to set reminders.

reminder.title: No Nut November Daily Reminder
reminder.body: Don't forget to check in today!

accentPicker.title: Accent Color
accentPicker.description: Customize the accent color for the current theme.

welcomeScreen.title: Join the Challenge
welcomeScreen.description: Enroll to begin your journey to conquer No Nut November.

dashboard.title: Leaderboard
dashboard.description: See who has the strongest will!

checkIn.title: Daily Check-in
checkIn.description: Click a day on the calendar to mark it as successful. Past days that are not checked will automatically be marked as failed (‚úï).

journal.title: Daily Journal
journal.description: Click on any checked day to open your journal. Write down your thoughts and track your journey. Days with notes are marked with a dot.

achievements.title: Unlock Achievements
achievements.description: When you reach important milestones (e.g., completing 7 days), you will automatically unlock the corresponding achievements.

settings.title: Reminders & Customization
settings.description: In the settings section below, you can set daily reminders, switch themes, and customize the accent color to personalize your experience.

cooldown.title: Relapse Cooldown
cooldown.description: If you fail a past day, you will be locked out from checking in for 24 hours to 'recover'. Be careful!

sharing.title: Share Your Progress
sharing.tweet: I'm on a {{streak}}-day streak in the #NoNutNovember challenge! Tracking my progress with this awesome app. My will is iron!
sharing.telegram: I'm on a {{streak}}-day streak in the No Nut November challenge! My will is iron!

quotes.q1: Go on bro, just a few more days!
quotes.q2: True strength is not in muscles, but in willpower.
quotes.q3: Every successful day is a victory. You've won again today!
quotes.q4: Don't let temporary desires destroy long-term goals.
quotes.q5: You are doing great! Keep moving forward.
quotes.q6: The only failure is when you give up. Don't give up!
quotes.q7: Remember why you started. Keep going!
quotes.q8: Today you are stronger than yesterday. Be proud!
quotes.q9: The peak of glory is ahead. Keep going!
quotes.q10: A moment of weakness, a month of regret. Stay strong!
quotes.q11: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
quotes.q12: The pain you feel today is the strength you feel tomorrow.
quotes.q13: Don't count the days, make the days count.
quotes.q14: You are stronger than your excuses.
quotes.q15: Master your desires, and you will master your life.
quotes.q16: Willpower is a muscle. The more you train it, the stronger it gets.
quotes.q17: A moment of satisfaction isn't worth a month of regret.
quotes.q18: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. You've come so far.
quotes.q19: Self-control is strength. Right thought is mastery. Calmness is power.
quotes.q20: You are not missing out on anything. You are regaining control.
quotes.q21: Be proud of how far you've come. Have faith in how far you can go.
quotes.q22: Victory is reserved for those who are willing to pay its price.
quotes.q23: Abstinence is the highest sign of self-mastery.
quotes.q25: Forge your will into a weapon.
quotes.q26: Your future self will thank you for your discipline today.
quotes.q27: The chains of habit are too light to be felt until they are too heavy to be broken. You are breaking them.
quotes.q28: Rise above the noise. Find your own signal.
quotes.q29: The harder the battle, the sweeter the victory.
quotes.q30: Control your mind, or it will control you.
